critical_sites.tectonic_boundary: North American Plate / Caribbean Plate boundary
critical_sites.sabotage_purpose: Anchor separation at plate boundary. Codify The Original Error. Sabotage The Table.
critical_sites.how_it_sabotages: Built at plate boundary to anchor separation. Codified The Original Error. Created spiritual contracts with dark energies. Turned natural separation into spiritual system.
critical_sites.connection_to_table: Built at plate boundary (rift) to sabotage The Table. Anchors separation. Prevents unity.
critical_sites.notes: The Mayans built pyramids to sabotage The Table. Chichen Itza is a major example.
